name: APIGatewayRestApiS3Location
description: S3Location is a property of the AWS::ApiGateway::RestApi resource that specifies the Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) location of a Swagger file that defines a set of RESTful APIs in JSON or YAML for an Amazon API Gateway (API Gateway) RestApi.

properties.name: Bucket
properties.description: The name of the S3 bucket where the Swagger file is stored.

properties.name: ETag
properties.description: The Amazon S3 ETag (a file checksum) of the Swagger file. If you don't specify a value, API Gateway skips ETag validation of your Swagger file.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The file name of the application revision (Amazon S3 object name).

properties.name: Version
properties.description: For versioning-enabled buckets, a specific version of the Swagger file.
